channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.3
item.description:
PostgreSQL 12 is now released!

This update includes the following versions of PostgreSQL!

  • PostgreSQL 12.0 with PostGIS 3.0.0beta1
  • PostgreSQL 11.5 with PostGIS 2.5.2
  • PostgreSQL 10.10 with PostGIS 2.4.7

Please note: The on-disk data format for PostgreSQL 12 has changed since the betas. If you want to keep your data from a pre-release version of PostgreSQL 12, you need to export your data with pg_dump before upgrading to the final version.
